text: The whole essence of the king's feeding is that it should be put haway somewhere out of "arm's way, if it's all the same to you."

passages.fragment: The whole essence of the king 's feeding is that it should be
passages.full_quote: <used>The whole essence of the king's feeding is that it should be</used>, well... an act of bonding between king and subjects

passages.fragment: that it should be put haway somewhere out of `` arm 's way , if it 's
passages.full_quote: "Ay think," said Mrs. Whitlow, "<used>that it should be put haway somewhere out of "arm's way, if it's</used> hall the hsame to you.""

passages.fragment: , if it 's all the same to you .
passages.full_quote: I reckon I'll stick to the bell, <used>if it's all the same to you</used>.
